He spawns Spirit Animals that you must",3:"§7kill to spawn a Spirit Bear which when killed drops the Spirit",4:"§7Bow which is a single shot bow and the only was to damage him.",5:"",6:"§c❤ Health§8: §c300.000",7:"",8:"§6§lPossible Drops:",9:"§5Spirit Bone §a(1x)",10:"§5Spirit Wing §a(1x)",11:"§5Spirit Boots §a(1x)",12:"§5Spirit Sword §a(1x)",13:"§5Spirit Bow §a(1x)",14:"§5Spirit Pet §a(1x)",15:"§6Spirit Pet §a(1x)"],Name:"§6Thorn (Boss)"},ExtraAttributes:{id:"THORN_BOSS"}}
lore: §7Thorn is the boss of Floor 4 of the Catacombs. He is a
§7'Shaman Necromancer', appears as a ghast, and does not
§7attack the player. He spawns Spirit Animals that you must
§7kill to spawn a Spirit Bear which when killed drops the Spirit
§7Bow which is a single shot bow and the only was to damage him.
